diff_hunk:
@@ -29,3 +29,4 @@
 from tensorflow.contrib.bayesflow.python.ops import stochastic_tensor
 from tensorflow.contrib.bayesflow.python.ops import stochastic_variables
 from tensorflow.contrib.bayesflow.python.ops import variational_inference
+# pylint: enable=unused-import,wildcard-import,line-too-long
body:
Oh yea, didn't think about these cases. I have found some more -- initially I was using `... | xargs grep "disable=wildcard-import"` which gave some results.

After changing it to `... | xargs grep -l "wildcard-import"` and `... | xargs grep -l "wildcard-import" | xargs grep -L "import \*"`, it gave me the offenders you mentioned -- will commit in a bit

body_text:
Oh yea, didn't think about these cases. I have found some more -- initially I was using ... | xargs grep "disable=wildcard-import" which gave some results.
After changing it to ... | xargs grep -l "wildcard-import" and ... | xargs grep -l "wildcard-import" | xargs grep -L "import \*", it gave me the offenders you mentioned -- will commit in a bit
